CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 28, 1963, pg. 13, reads: "Arty Palaver - Discussing the surrealistic aspects of painter Charles Hampton's 'Still Life' (in oval frame) are (left to right) sculptor Thaddeus Mosley and painters Charlotte Richardson, Charles Stevenson, Charles Hampton and Alice Bell, all of whom displayed works at the 'Showcase on Art.'. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Sculptor Thaddeus "Thad" Mosley and painters Charlotte Richardson, Charles Stevenson, Charles Hampton and Alice Bell looking at Hampton's painting "Still Life" in oval frame
